name: 50 Small Kraft Pillow Boxes - eco-friendly - 100% recycled paperboard
description:
50 Small Kraft Pillow Boxes - eco-friendly

Dimensions: 3 1/4” Long X 2” Wide X 5/8” Deep 
(box depth in center narrows to each side)

FEATURES:
♥ easy open and self-closing curved flaps 
♥ fully assembled 
♥ ships and stores flat
♥ made from 100% recycled paperboard

PLEASE NOTE:
Please check the dimensions of this box to make sure it is a good fit for your needs. These cannot be returned. If you are unsure about the size, you may request or buy a sample of this sample product from our sample page which will allow you to test for sizing before purchasing a larger lot.

name: 10 Bubbling Tub Bath Salts Carton Sets™ 4 pc sets all-inclusive packaging sets
description:
10 Sets Bubbling Tub Bath Salt Cartons ™
"One Use" portion size
(does not include salts)

Dark Ivory Matte Finish

3 1/4" High X 2 3/8" Wide
1 1/8" at widest depth - narrows to top of carton

Includes 10 sets.
Each set contains:
one small "one portion use" carton
one clear plastic zip-lock insert bag
one matching tag 
one piece of raffia

~pre-secured top with bottom tuck-end flap 
~fully assembled 
~ships flat for low shipping costs and easy storage 
~a Box Bliss™ original exclusive design lending eye-catching appeal to "catch the eye" of your customer 
~pre-secured top with "easy fill" B-Tuck bottoms allow for quick and easy preparation of your products for presentation

Nice for samples of bath salts, "one-use" portion bath salts, small wax tarts/melts, favor packaging filled with bath and body products and more!

Please note, these are small cartons, appropriate for bath salt samples. If you are unsure that this product will work with your product, we recommend that you request a sample or purchase from the sample ad before purchasing a larger lot. These cannot be returned. Purchasing one sample will allow you to test for size, color, paper board weight, color and quality.

name: 10 Sets Bubbling Tub Bath Salts Pillow Box™ 4 piece set
description:
OUR NEWEST PRODUCT!

10 Sets - The Bubbling Tub Bath Salts Pillow Box™ 4 piece set
(does not includes salts)

A large pillow large box with our original and exclusive Bubbling Tub™ design.

Sized for a "one-use" portion of bath salts.  A great way to market your bath salts in sample size packaging.

You will receive 10 sets, each 4 piece set includes: box, raffia, clear insert bag and matching tag (tag not photographed)

DIMENSIONS: 
4 1/2” Long X 4” Wide X 1 1/4” Deep 
(box depth in center narrows to each side 
see box for presentation of dimensions)

FEATURES:

“READY-TO-GO PRODUCT PACKAGING” – 4 piece all-inclusive sets (includes everything you need to create this beautiful little package, including a tag) – does not include bath salts

Fully assembled

A Box Bliss™ Bubbling Tub original – “eye-catching” design – an exclusive product

Self-closing curved flaps

Ships and stores flat

NOTE: Please check the dimensions and specs of this product before ordering since they cannot be returned. You may purchase a sample of this product through a sample listing. This allows you to test the product for size, quality, color, thickness and other specs before purchasing a larger lot.

description: TO SEE OUR FULL PRODUCT LINE AND ADDITIONAL COLORS FOR THE BUBBLING TUB SOAP BOX ™, CLICK HERE TO GO TO OUR MAIN ONLINE CATALOG AND BULK VOLUME LISTINGS.
